message.short: Interlocking Check failure.
message.long: Interlocking Check %interlocking_check_nid% failed while starting or completing Work Order Operation %wo_operation_nid%.

message.short: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.

message.short: Interlocking Check results could not be logged in History.
message.long: Interlocking Check results could not be logged in History.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation.

message.short: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation: the Interlocking Check does not exist.

message.short: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation: the Work Order Operation does not exist.

message.short: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation: fields Inbound and Outbound must be configured as expected by the system.

message.short: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while linking the Interlocking Check to the Work Order Operation: some parameters have not been set correctly.

message.short: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Steps.
message.long: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Steps.

message.short: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step: the Interlocking Check does not exist.

message.short: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step: the Work Order Steps do not exist.

message.short: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step: fields Inbound and Outbound must be configured as expected by the system.

message.short: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while linking Interlocking Checks to Work Order Step: some parameters have not been set correctly.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation: the link does not exist.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Operation: the status of Work Order or Work Order Operation inhibits unlinking.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps: the link does not exist.

message.short: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps.
message.long: Error while unlinking the Interlocking Check from the Work Order Steps: the status of Work Order, Work Order Operation or Work Order Step inhibits unlinking.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Steps.
message.long: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Steps.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Step: the link does not exist.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Step: Work Order, Work Order Operation or Work Order Step is in an invalid status.

message.short: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Step.
message.long: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Step: the Parameter value has not been set correctly.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Operation.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Operation: the link does not exist.

message.short: Error while updating Interlocking Checks on Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Operation: Work Order or Work Order Operation is not in a correct status.

message.short: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Operation.
message.long: Error while updating the link between the Interlocking Check and the Work Order Operation: the Parameter value has not been set correctly.

message.short: Unable to start Work Order Operation/Step: Interlocking Check failure.
message.long: Unable to start Work Order Operation/Step: Interlocking Check failure.

message.short: Error during input validation.
message.long: Error during input validation.

message.short: The inbound Interlocking Check is not linked to an existing entity.
message.long: The inbound Interlocking Check is not linked to an existing entity (Work Order Operation, Work Order Step).

message.short: The outbound Interlocking Check is not linked to an existing entity.
message.long: The outbound Interlocking Check is not linked to an existing entity (Work Order Operation, Work Order Step).

message.short: Unable to complete Work Order Operation/Step: Interlocking Check failure.
message.long: Unable to complete Work Order Operation/Step: Interlocking Check failure.
